wikipedia_page.main: Shaun McSkimming (born 29 May 1970 in Stranraer) is a Scottish former footballer who played as a left-sided attacking midfielder who played for Dundee, Kilmarnock, Motherwell and Peterhead in Scotland as well as Atlanta Silverbacks in the USA.

response: *Shaun McSkimming (born 1970), Scottish former footballer who played as a midfielder
